channel.title: Vuex on Bachdx's
channel.description: Recent content in Vuex on Bachdx's

item.title: The making of Todo App using Vuex
item.description: Its has been a while since my first post I’ve to commit that Im kinda lazy lately Okay..Enough trash talk So I’ve bee working with VueJs for a while which is very cool. But the more I work with VueJs, the more I realize that I need a “state management system” cause everytime I break down the components and add actions into them…It become really messy So I decided to learn VueX
